overview: Rugby Fuckers Or Football Hooligans? Tough choice eh! !It's a Game Of Two Halves. Two big rugger buggers versus two footie kit lads getting down & filthy in the locker rooms in a double scene special release. A load of pre-shower, sweaty post match down and dirty play with these four lads as they get dildoed, rogered and rimmed all for your pleasure!
title: Game Of Two Halves
